title: (x) GIW Installations, Inc. - Helvetica, Charter Oak {Chesh, Metadox}
content:
Hey everyone. What fonts are being used on this card? Anybody know?   
   
Thanks   
-Dave ![Card](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052954im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47900.jpg)
author: popinfresh

comments.content: It's basically versions of Helvetica and Helvetica Condensed.
and also a little bit of slanted [Charter Oak](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052954/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/charter-oak/urw-d-normal/testdrive.html?s=GW&p=72).

Plus, look at the horrible fake small caps and the W and E in the presidents name have been inlarged. Dave was this card done by a printer? There was no care in the kerning especially the WA combination in Wayne

Watching their card.... W ould you let these guys install you anything ?   
   
Sorry Dave, I couldn't hep it.
